content: by emily bolduan © maker maker 2019 top shaping work the following decreases and continue to keep pattern correct by lining up with previous bobbles at the edge only place a bobble if you have 2 or more stitches between bobble and decrease round 1 k1 k2tog work in pattern to 3 sts before marker ssk k1 sm repeat once more 4 sts decreased repeat this round 11 more times or until 21 sts remain on each needle 42 sts total cuff change to smaller needles set up round k2tog p2 k2 repeat to 3 sts before marker p2 k1 sm repeat once more two stitches decreased 40 sts total round 1 k1 p2 k2 repeat to last 3 sts p2 k1 our website is makermakerstore com repeat round 1 until ribbing measures 11-12cm and you can find our other free patterns on ravelry https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/maker-maker- store/patterns bind off loosely in pattern by binding off as usual but knit the knits and purl the purls as they appear happy making finishing weave in ends to use fold empty hot water bottle in half lengthwise and slip into cover before filling 4 designed by emily bolduan © maker maker 2019
